nodes.text: The Model 213 Perforator barrel was a model of augmented spin barrel that increased the damage output and armor penetration of any weapon it was attached to, but also increased maintenance requirements and downtime due to increased wear and tear on the barrel and frame. The barrel was produced by the company BlasTech Industries and sold for 1750 during Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic following the Battle of Yavin. The attachment was only compatible with blaster rifles and heavy blaster rifles.
The Model 213 was first mentioned in the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2014.
